CustomField.formula: IF( (ISPICKVAL( Day_1_Role__c, "Member") || ISPICKVAL( Day_1_Role__c, "Prospect") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_1_Role__c, "Guest") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_1_Role__c, "Speaker")) && (ISPICKVAL( Day_2_Role__c, "Member") || ISPICKVAL( Day_2_Role__c, "Prospect") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role__c, "Guest") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role__c, "Speaker")) && (ISPICKVAL( Dinner_Role__c , "Member") || ISPICKVAL( Dinner_Role__c, "Prospect") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_Role__c, "Guest") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_Role__c, "Speaker")), "Yes", "No")
CustomField.label: Attended All 3?
